channel.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs' PowerMiner.[SRL][RS2]
channel.description:
Well, I made this for my SRL Application script over at villu-reborn, but I thought I'd post it here to get some suggestions and improve it.
This uses SRL 3.4 and has Anti-Randoms, Anti-Ban, selective dropping ( Only drops ores and dwarf items ) , AutoColor, Multi-Player, fail-safes, etc. Also has a pretty accurate progress report that gives individual player reports.
This script is open to criticism, just try to make it helpful. Please post all bugs you find, suggestions, and please post progress reports!! Right now I have it so that it doesn't clear the debug each report, so that you can see everything that happens.
[u]Known Bugs:[/u]
[ul] [li]Gas only works some of the time :rolleyes:[/li][/ul]
[u]Versions / Changes:[/u] .9 - First Release.
-Weibs.

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs' PowerMiner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Alright, there’s 2 things that could’ve happened: If it doesn’t find the pick head color, then it will log out, or, if it can’t find the ore color and the autocolor cant find the ore color, it will log out.

So, first, check to make sure you set the ‘rock to mine’ correctly, and second, if that doesn’t work, search for the procedure LoadColors around line 137. Find the rock you’re trying to mine, and manually pick the rock color and replace the one there. Finally, if that doesn’t work, I’m gonna guess that its not finding the pick which would mean there’s something wrong with the FindPickHeadColor procedure in SRL, which I could try to modify to correct it.

Try that, and tell me if you still have any problems.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs' PowerMiner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Your total players needs to be set at 1 for that problem.

As for the logging out, I’m not sure, I think I ran into that problem when I was developing the script, but I can’t remember what I did. Could you try it again and tell me exactly what it does ( Example: Logs in, goes to stats game tab, then to equip game tab, then to inv, then hovers over rock, logs out ). Or whatever happens.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs' PowerMiner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @squency squency
item.description:
@squency wrote:

i did post wat it said on the bottom …look above[br][size=1]Posted at: October 31, 2006, 06:41:57 AM[/size][hr]ok i didd wat u told me nashi and heres wat i came up with:

[scar]Const
//------------Setup Here-----------//

TotalPlayers = 0; //Number of players declared below.
StartingPlayer = 0; //Staring Player Number.

WaitTime = 3; //Wait Time inbetween rocks, IN SECONDS!
MinsPerLoad = 8; //Minutes per load.
LoadsToDo = 0; //# of loads to do for each user.
//Set at 0 to mine until stuck.

UseAutoColor = True; //Use AutoColor? Recommended!
RunDirection = ‘N’; //Dir to run when fight occurs.
UseBenMouse = True; //Use BenMouse? Recommended.
TheMouseSpeed = 9; //Mouse Speed. Lower = Faster.

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin

NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer := StartingPlayer;

Players[0].Name := ‘NAME HERE’; //Username.
Players[0].Pass := ‘*******’; //Password.
Players[0].Nick := ‘eanc’; //3-4 Chars of the Username.
Players[0].Active := True; //Will this player be Active?
Players[0].String1 := ‘copper’; //Ore to mine.
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Do NOT Touch.[/scar]

heres the probelm:

[scar][Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 64 in script C:Documents and SettingsJamesLocal SettingsTemporary Internet FilesContent.IE5381A3240WeibsPowerMiner_V.9[1].scar[/scar]

item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[scar]Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin

NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer := StartingPlayer;

Players[0].Name := ‘*’; //Username.
Players[0].Pass := '’; //Password.
Players[0].Nick := ‘oote’; //3-4 Chars of the Username.
Players[0].Active := True; //Will this player be Active?
Players[0].String1 := ‘copper’; //Ore to mine.
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Do NOT Touch.[/scar]
you only ened one if your only using one char, but then you need to change the totalplayers[scar]Const
//------------Setup Here-----------//
TotalPlayers = 1; //Number of players declared below.[/scar]

I think you might have the same problem as me, Also, you should post what it said in the bottom box, incase it said it couldnt find the ore colour or something

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Weibs' PowerMiner.[SRL][RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Oh crap, if you’re comparing mine to Wizzup?'s, his will win. Lol, I’m running his upstairs on my comp, and using RC to keep it going. Got a 23 hour, and 30 min progress when I got home from school this afternoon ;).

But if you want you can go ahead and post suggestions, but again, it’ll probably be a while 'cause of my current project.
